dialog.text: Why does it feel like there's a darkness living inside me? Like I'm two people.
dialog.instructions: Onyx: Childlike curiosity, breathy, hesitant; quiet urgency; slightly fast when anxious.

dialog.text: Because that 'darkness' is your shadow — all the hurts, fears and stories you tucked away. It arrived to protect you in the only way it knew.
dialog.instructions: Ash: Deep, resonant, calm; compassionate tone; slow, deliberate pacing; warm resonance.

dialog.text: Protect me? It only shames me. When I shove it away it gets louder, angrier.
dialog.instructions: Onyx: Small, edgy; rising intonation; honest frustration mixed with fear.

dialog.text: Pushing makes the wound roar. The inner work is simple and brave: look, name, feel, forgive. Invite that part in like a frightened child at your door.
dialog.instructions: Ash: Soft but firm; encouraging; gentle cadence; imagine guiding someone through a doorway.

dialog.text: What if I can't stop hating it? What if I'm broken beyond repair?
dialog.instructions: Onyx: Fragile, whispering; rapid heartbeat under the voice; vulnerability.

dialog.text: You are not broken. You're whole and learning. Try this: say, 'I see you. I'm here.' Breathe with it. Love doesn't force — it welcomes and heals.
dialog.instructions: Ash: Reassuring, steady; low volume; long pauses to allow the words to land.

dialog.text: I... I see you. I'm here. I'm sorry you were hurt.
dialog.instructions: Onyx: Hesitant then softer; a single inhale before speaking; relief beginning to surface.

dialog.text: Listen. When the shadow speaks, listen without judgment. It will tell the story of why it protects. Hearing it dissolves its power to wound.
dialog.instructions: Ash: Gentle, attentive; patient cadence; almost like guiding someone to listen to a heartbeat.

dialog.text: It feels lighter — like a hand loosened from my chest. I can breathe.
dialog.instructions: Onyx: Surprised, relieved; slower speech; warmth returning to the voice.

dialog.text: That loosened weight is freedom. Divine love isn't a distant prize — it's the home you rediscover when you embrace every part of yourself.
dialog.instructions: Ash: Warm, luminous; uplifted tone; steady and inspiring; moderate speed.

dialog.text: So healing is choosing myself, even the parts I'm scared of?
dialog.instructions: Onyx: Hopeful, seeking clarity; softer, steady now.

dialog.text: Yes. Keep showing up with curiosity and compassion. Small, honest acts — a breath, a welcome, a forgiveness — transform the landscape of your inner life.
dialog.instructions: Ash: Kind, encouraging; closing with quiet authority; gentle tempo to leave space.

dialog.text: Breathe now. Share one thing you noticed in your shadow today in the comments — or simply sit with this: where might love be waiting for you?
dialog.instructions: Ash: Inviting, warm; soft call to action; calm cadence; compassionate smile in the voice.
